about_the_game:
SPARK OF JOY is a romantic comedy adult visual novel. Jack and Joy's love story begins like any other-filled with excitement, passion, and the promise of something deeper. As they embark on their journey together, life seems perfect. But fate intervenes when a devastating event forces Joy to put their relationship on hold, leaving Jack heartbroken and adrift.

You play as Jack. In your quest to reclaim the connection you once shared with Joy, you cross paths with four alluring and complex women, each offering you a different kind of solace, distraction, or temptation. With your heart torn and your mind clouded by desire, you must navigate these entanglements, all while you longing for Joy remains the pulse beneath the surface.

Will you find your way back to the love you lost, or will the allure of these new relationships pull  you in direction you never expected?

What's in the game:

  • HD images telling the stories of Jack, Joy, and other four hotties.

  • A story of romance, courtship, chance encounters, and carnal delights.

  • Animated sex scenes and other animations throughout to enrich the experience.

  • Multiple endings.

  • Immersive sound effects and music tracks that enhance atmosphere.

  • Point & click interactions with the environment.
